alert.note: Alert for North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Marcell, or 24 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
